properties.name: application.maven.version
properties.description: Version of the application Bedetheque-Scraper.

properties.name: application.downloads.localcache.active
properties.description: Boolean to (de)active the preloading of all medias scraped from bedetheque on the application server.

properties.description: Download directory for author photos (thumbnails).

properties.description: Boolean to (de)active the web logging traces.

properties.description: Bedetheque home path.

properties.name: application.lang.accepted_languages
properties.description: List of all languages accepted by the API.

properties.description: Default language used by the API.

properties.name: application.security.jwtSecret
properties.description: Secret JWT salt text.

properties.name: application.security.jwtExpirationMs
properties.description: Durability of a JWT token before expiration (in millis).

properties.name: application.security.front-url
properties.description: Base url accepted by the API.

properties.description: (De)active the response trace logs.

properties.name: application.scraping.latency
properties.description: Countdown betwwen two url requests to bedetheque.com.

properties.name: application.downloads.localcache.basepath
properties.description: Local basepath to store media files
